alert.note: Alert for Fayette Ridges (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 19 at 7:41PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN WASHINGTON...SOUTHERN WESTMORELAND...GREENE...FAYETTE...MONONGALIA...WETZEL...TUCKER... PRESTON...MARSHALL AND MARION COUNTIES THROUGH 900 PM EST... At 740 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from 7 miles east of Valley Grove to 7 miles east of Rock Cave. Movement was east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Gusty wind have a history of causing power outages. Locations impacted include... Morgantown, Fairmont, Uniontown, Connellsville, Waynesburg, Westover, Kingwood, Mannington, Star City, Parsons, Terra Alta, and Davis. This includes the following highways... Interstate 68 in West Virginia between mile markers 1 and 31. Interstate 70 in Pennsylvania near mile marker 39. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 79 and 100. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 24. Interstate 79 in West Virginia between mile markers 130 and 160. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
